COMMAND.name: show ecmp information
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to show the running information of ecmp settings.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to show the running information of ecmp settings.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example shows how to show the running information: Switch# show ecmp information ECMP load balance enable mode: Static ECMP hash-field-select: ipsa ipda

COMMAND.name: group select

PARAM.help: Take inner dst-port into hash keys

PARAM.help: Take inner src-port into hash keys

PARAM.name: inner-macsa
PARAM.help: Take inner macsa into hash keys

PARAM.name: inner-macda
PARAM.help: Take inner macda into hash keys

PARAM.name: inner-ipsa
PARAM.help: Take inner ipsa into hash keys

PARAM.name: inner-ipda
PARAM.help: Take inner ipda into hash keys

PARAM.name: inner-ip-protocol
PARAM.help: Take inner ipv4/ipv6-protocol into hash keys

PARAM.name: inner-dst-port
PARAM.help: Take inner dst-port into hash keys

PARAM.name: inner-dst-port
PARAM.help: Take inner dst-port into hash keys

PARAM.name: inner-macsa
PARAM.help: Take inner macsa into hash keys

PARAM.name: inner-macda
PARAM.help: Take inner macda into hash keys

PARAM.name: inner-ipsa
PARAM.help: Take inner ipsa into hash keys

PARAM.name: inner-ipda
PARAM.help: Take inner ipda into hash keys

PARAM.name: inner-ip-protocol
PARAM.help: Take inner ipv4/ipv6-protocol into hash keys

PARAM.name: inner-src-port
PARAM.help: Take inner src-port into hash keys

COMMAND.ACTION: methods="" idx=0 for opt in ${__line} do idx="`expr $idx + 1`" if [ $idx -gt 4 ]; then if [ "$methods" == "" ]; then methods="$opt" else methods=$methods",$opt" fi fi done cdbctl update/cdb/sys/ecmp_global/hash_key/$methods

COMMAND.name: ecmp load-balance hash-arithmetic
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to set ecmp hash arithmetic.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to set ecmp hash arithmetic.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example shows how to set ecmp hash arithmetic: Switch(config)# ecmp load-balance hash-arithmetic crc

COMMAND.name: no ecmp load-balance
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to unset ecmp load-balance hash-arithmetic.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to unset ecmp load-balance hash-arithmetic.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example shows how to unset ecmp load-balance hash-arithmetic: Switch(config)# no ecmp load-balance hash-arithmetic

COMMAND.name: ecmp load-balance-mode
COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "static" == ${lb_mode} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/sys/ecmp_global/load_balance_mode/${static_mode}/dlb_mode_type/normal elif [ "dynamic" == ${lb_mode} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/sys/ecmp_global/load_balance_mode/${lb_mode}/dlb_mode_type/todo else cdbctl update/cdb/sys/ecmp_global/load_balance_mode/${lb_mode}/rr_prefix/${ip} fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to set ecmp load-balance-mode.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to set ecmp load-balance-mode.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example shows how to set ecmp load-balance-mode: Switch(config)# ecmp load-balance-mode static self-healing

COMMAND.name: no ecmp load-balance-mode

PARAM.name: ip
PARAM.help: IP destination prefix (e.g. 10.0.0.0/8), vrf private route isn't support RR

COMMAND.ACTION: if [ "static" == ${lb_mode} ]; then cdbctl update/cdb/sys/ecmp_global/load_balance_mode/static/dlb_mode_type/normal else cdbctl delete/cdb/sys/rr_prefix/rr_prefix/${ip} fi
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to unset ecmp load-balance-mode.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to unset ecmp load-balance-mode.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example shows how to unset ecmp load-balance-mode Switch(config)# no ecmp load-balance-mode static self-healing

COMMAND.ACTION: methods="" idx=0 for opt in ${__line} do idx="`expr $idx + 1`" if [ $idx -gt 2 ]; then if [ "$methods" == "" ]; then methods="$opt" else methods=$methods",$opt" fi fi done cdbctl update/cdb/sys/ecmp_global/hash_key/$methods
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to set ecmp hash-field-select.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to set ecmp hash-field-select.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example shows how to set ecmp hash-field-select: Switch(config)# ecmp hash-field-select ip-protocol src-port dst-port

COMMAND.name: no ecmp hash-field-select
COMMAND.help: Hash field select for static and self-healing ECMP
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to unset ecmp hash-field-select
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to unset ecmp hash-field-select
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: The following example shows how to unset ecmp hash-field-select: Switch(config)# no ecmp hash-field-select
